text:
[Verse]
Run through the night
Feel the wind so right
Stars in our sight
Moon shining bright

[Verse 2]
City lights below
In the dark we glow
Holding on we'll show
Love will ever grow

[Chorus]
We're chasing the moon
Tonight we can't lose
Dancing to the tune
In a world we choose

[Verse 3]
Time stands still
Hearts with a thrill
Climbing this hill
Moments to fill

[Bridge]
Dreams so high
Under the sky
Together we'll fly
Touching the sky

[Chorus]
We're chasing the moon
Tonight we can't lose
Dancing to the tune
In a world we choose
title: Chasing the Moon
